raw_body: Beloved wife of late Lucien De Zoysa, mother of Lana De Zoysa Wijemanne, mother-in-law of Channe Wijemanne, adoring grandmother of Senaya and Kaavinda Wijemanne, loving sister of Ernest, late Dinky, late Raja and of Gandhi Macintyre, loving sister-in-law of Nalini, Birte and Dorothy, much loved aunt of Amrit, Raina, Helger, Gunner, Rabi, Yohan, Judy and Timothy.
